about_the_game:
Sandbox where you became a real mechanic. Build everything from the scratch. Make a simple construction or join wheels and engines to build a car then ride it. Build a rocket and fly. Construct a tank to defend yourself.

CREATE

Create anything form scrap just your imagination could invent. Use simple blocs or complex physics simulation. Stand on the pass of engineer.

BEYOND PLATFORM

Unique save system let you generate many worlds and share them with friends or your mobile device. Just send a save file and continue creating. Blueprints will help you to save or load any construction on the go.

short_description: Physics-based cross-play mechanic simulator. Become a real engineer, create new mechanisms and build your worlds. Craft, join & share your creation across PC and mobile devices. Play beyond one platform.
